definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

sentences.english: Objective To study Optimization of the react conditions of benzyloxy-benzaldehyde synthesized under microwave irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波合成苄氧基苯甲醛的最佳反应条件。

sentences.english: Poly (vinyl alcohol) has been protected against radiation by benzalation and benzoylation.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙烯醇的耐辐解可通地苄叉化和苯甲酰化提高。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical efficiency of Bofonazole solution compound in treating Keratotic tinea hand or pedis .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察复方联苯苄唑治疗角化型手足癣的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The results show that ceric sulfate is an excellent catalyst for the synthesis of benzyl butyrate.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明硫酸高铈是合成丁酸苄酯的优良催化剂。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the nursing experience in caring patients with delayed allergic response to benzathine penicillin.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结苄星青霉素迟发过敏反应的护理体会。

sentences.english: A single intramuscular injection of Benzathine Penicillin is curative.
sentences.chinese: 肌内注射一剂苄星青霉素即有疗效。

sentences.english: Conclution The experiments provide a theoretical basis to assess the safety of the Penicillin G Benzathine injection for clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 结论国产注射用苄星青霉素在该实验条件下是安全的。

sentences.english: This paper describes the development and application of bensulfuron-methyl in China.
sentences.chinese: 概述了苄嘧磺隆在我国的开发与应用情况。
